targets.rawSql: SELECT January AS 'JAN' FROM wifiBandung WHERE nama_lokasi LIKE '$lokasi';
SELECT February AS 'FEB' FROM wifiBandung  WHERE nama_lokasi LIKE '$lokasi';
SELECT March AS 'MAR' FROM wifiBandung WHERE nama_lokasi LIKE '$lokasi';
SELECT April AS 'APR' FROM wifiBandung WHERE nama_lokasi LIKE '$lokasi';
SELECT May AS 'MAY' FROM wifiBandung WHERE nama_lokasi LIKE '$lokasi';
SELECT June AS 'JUN' FROM wifiBandung WHERE nama_lokasi LIKE '$lokasi';
SELECT July AS 'JUL' FROM wifiBandung WHERE nama_lokasi LIKE '$lokasi';
SELECT August AS 'AUG' FROM wifiBandung WHERE nama_lokasi LIKE '$lokasi';
SELECT September AS 'SEP' FROM wifiBandung WHERE nama_lokasi LIKE '$lokasi';
SELECT October AS 'OCT' FROM wifiBandung WHERE nama_lokasi LIKE '$lokasi';
SELECT November AS 'NOV' FROM wifiBandung WHERE nama_lokasi LIKE '$lokasi';
SELECT December AS 'DES' FROM wifiBandung WHERE nama_lokasi LIKE '$lokasi';
SELECT grand_total FROM wifiBandung WHERE nama_lokasi LIKE '$lokasi';
SELECT SUM(grand_total) FROM wifiBandung WHERE deskripsi LIKE 'Kecamatan%';
SELECT SUM(grand_total) FROM wifiBandung WHERE nama_lokasi LIKE 'Masjid%';
SELECT SUM(grand_total) FROM wifiBandung WHERE nama_lokasi LIKE 'Taman%';
